summary: Documentary that follows the struggle for control of Dr. Albert C. Barnes' 25 billion dollar collection of modern and post-impressionist art.
cast: Julian Bond|David D'Arcy|Richard Feigen|Richard H. Glanton|Christopher Knight|Ross L. Mitchell|Irv Nahan|Harry Sefarbi|John F. Street|Nick Tinari|Robert Zaller
title: The Art of the Steal
